snippet.title: Moorhuhn Kart 4 – Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready for the next chapter in the Moorhuhn Kart series, to some of you known by the Crazy Chicken Kart series, coming 13th March 2025! 🏎️💨
Moorhuhn Kart 4 is bringing back all the fun and excitement of kart racing with new tracks, funny items, and crazy challenges. Are you ready to race your way to victory? Watch the official teaser trailer now and get a sneak peek of what’s coming!

Features:
🏎️ 12 new tracks and environments to race through
🐔 8 characters: 7 beloved Moorhuhn characters plus one fresh face
🔸 Trusty old items and some funny new ones 
🤪 Fun for all ages with multiplayer mode and challenges
🎮 Coming soon to Steam, Nintendo Switch, PS4 and PS5!

✅ Wishlist on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3012980/Crazy_Chicken_Kart_4/

👉 Stay up to date with all the latest news:
🔗 Visit us on our website: https://www.korion.de/en/
🔗 Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/korion.interactive/
🔗 Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KorionGames
🔗 Join us on Twitter/X: https://x.com/KorionG
🔗 Check us out on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/korion-interactive.bsky.social
🔗 Have a look at our TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@korion.interactive

Release Date: 13th March 2025

🗣️ Join our Discord Server to chat with us, share feedback, and find other players! 
🔗 https://discord.gg/j4HCKTYXqg

Don't forget to like, comment, and share if you’re excited for Moorhuhn Kart 4! Stay tuned for more updates, trailers, and exclusive content leading up to the release! 🐔🏎️💨
